channel.title: [PI] Npc Slow [VIDEO]
channel.description:
Hello, I want to fix a problem I am having when I attack a npc it is very slow for the npc to attack back and when it does the hit marker's takes to long to show up. If you could help me to fix any of these I would be really grateful.[b]If you need any file just ask[/b]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NQ30sdVih-w&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
